post.body: check out http://planet5d.com for more 5d2 drooling :)
congrats on the 5d2! Got any connections inside Canon to promote my 5d wiki? http://planet5d.com
thanks - all i want is a nice visual file management tool like I'm used to in Aperture - guess I've got to find it in another tool
thanks - i ended up emailing smugmug and they added me to the beta - appreciate it!
drool over the 5d2 videos here http://is.gd/cP6x and you'll want one!
but Best Buy has the 5d mk ii on sale today - read http://is.gd/9pTe - granted most stores don't have stock but some do
congrats on the 5d2! Anyone else want one best buy? $153 off today -- check this page for 10% off coupon http://is.gd/9pTe
yea, but FCP doesn't manage the libraries like Aperture does - guess FCServer does what I'm thinking of
thanks for the Digg too!
good point. i was thinking more of Aperture just for the visual management of clips... is there something else that will do?
awesome! So where's the video to go with that new mic? we'll put it on http://is.gd/cP6x
nope - i read somewhere there was a beta but don't know how to join... will look - do you have a link?
thanks for the link (added to 5d encyclopedia)
is that in a larger size somewhere?
is wishing for a major endorsement for 5d wiki for Christmas... anyone got any ideas where i might find a secret santa with connections? :)
my second video is up on smugmug http://tinyurl.com/8o826g
wondering when Aperture will handle videos! Do i need to tell Apple this is a requirement?
note to self - please remember to turn off the IS on the lens when the 5d mk ii is on the tripod - no need to hear that noise in the movies!
Couple of new reviews and Comparisons to other cameras on the 5d wiki - please digg this page http://is.gd/cIEn if you're liking the wiki?
uploading my second 5d mk ii video to smugmug - the first one took something like 12 hours for them to process... this one is 2x bigger
